comments.comment: 1:42 While I believe it's true that people grow difficulty or hardship, the problem I have with PTG is it justifies mistreatment. I know of many people who ultimately value their (induced-by-other) trauma. A famous example is the Stockdale Paradox. This guy was a POW for something like 8 years and he had this to say: "‚ÄúI never doubted not only that I would get out, but also that I would prevail in the end and turn the experience into the defining event of my life, which, in retrospect, I would not trade.‚Äù While the story of survival and perserverence is impressive to say "I'm glad I was a POW and suffered through torture" is a bit troubling.

comments.comment: 3:09. So I‚Äôm a rare breed of idiot. I was like 19 or something and went ‚Äúhmm. Well, I‚Äôve been fairly normal with my emotions. And happiness is seemingly the most 2 dimensional, boring and useless of all the emotions. I‚Äôm never driven to do something if I‚Äôm happy. So, lemme simplify my life and cut it out a bit. This pattern of thinking ‚Äúhappiness= a wast of time‚Äù eventually became automatic and, I would rather think sad, depressing thoughts than happy ones. I actually gave myself depression. Like, bad depression. Like 2 years into this and I was like ‚Äúwait. I‚Äôm depressed. And I actually did this deliberately. Broooo. I‚Äôm an idiot‚Äù and laughed my ass off for like 20 mins. So than I was like ‚Äúok. Some happiness is way more useful than none at all. Imma just think some happy thoughts again, even if I think they are delusional, and maybe I can balance out and forget this ever happened. And like 4 months later, that worked. So yeah. I think if you are in the opposite boat where you think happiness is dumb‚Ä¶.don‚Äôt like use this video as confirmation bias. You have to at least see it as like, neutral. Because, it is important. Like, why tf would you ever commit to anything or take a risk if it‚Äôs not gonna work out. Or like, go out if your comfort zone if you don‚Äôt care. It‚Äôs like, these sorts of videos are decent for those who already properly understand what this dude is talking about. It‚Äôs like ‚Äúoh yeah. I‚Äôve been slacking. Thank you.‚Äù But, if you are 19 year old me, and an idiot‚Ä¶.think first. Lmfao.
